headline: Exxon Mobil’s Environmental Cases Test Climate Liability And Valuation Gap
summary: US Supreme Court agrees to hear Exxon Mobil’s appeal related to a Colorado climate liability lawsuit involving NYSE:XOM. The case centers on whether state courts can hold global energy producers financially responsible for local climate related costs. Exxon Mobil and partners have initiated arbitration against Kazakhstan over a multi billion dollar environmental fine. Both matters spotlight legal and regulatory risks tied to environmental obligations for large international oil...

Both matters spotlight legal and regulatory risks tied to environmental obligations for large international oil...

headline: US stock futures waver as Nvidia's blockbuster results draw muted response
summary: U.S. stock index futures were muted on Thursday as Nvidia's stellar quarterly results garnered a lukewarm response from investors and downbeat earnings from software company Salesforce weighed on ‌sentiment. Nvidia inched 0.6% higher in premarket trading after the chipmaker posted better-than-expected results for the January quarter ‌and forecast current-quarter revenue above market estimates. "The needle has clearly shifted when it comes to what its going to take to convince investors ​that the billions being poured into AI infrastructure will pay off," said Raffi Boyadjian, lead market analyst at Trading Point.

raw.headline: US stock futures waver as Nvidia's blockbuster results draw muted response
raw.summary: U.S. stock index futures were muted on Thursday as Nvidia's stellar quarterly results garnered a lukewarm response from investors and downbeat earnings from software company Salesforce weighed on ‌sentiment. Nvidia inched 0.6% higher in premarket trading after the chipmaker posted better-than-expected results for the January quarter ‌and forecast current-quarter revenue above market estimates. "The needle has clearly shifted when it comes to what its going to take to convince investors ​that the billions being poured into AI infrastructure will pay off," said Raffi Boyadjian, lead market analyst at Trading Point.
